pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Divine Dessert | Your Privacy MattersCakesAbout UsManufacturingContactsCakesAbout UsManufacturingContactsPrivacy PolicyWelcome to Divine Dessert. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled securely and responsibly. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website and make use of our services.1. Information We Collect:Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number, etc.) when you place an order or contact us.Payment information to process your orders securely.Non-personal identification information (browser type, IP address, etc.) to improve our website.2. How We Use Your Information:To process and fulfill your orders.To send periodic emails regarding your order status and updates.To improve our website and customer service.To comply with legal obligations.3. Protection of Your Information:We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information.All sensitive information is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology.4. Sharing Your Information:We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to outside parties, except when necessary to provide our services (e.g., shipping companies).5. Your Consent:By using our site, you consent to our privacy policy.Changes to Our Privacy Policy:Any changes to our privacy policy will be posted on this page.For more information, please contact us at: +91-119-5648230 divinedessert@gmail.com Verna Industrial Estate, Verna, Goa 403718Privacy PolicyTerms and Conditions +91-119-5648230 divinedessert@gmail.com Verna Industrial Estate, Verna, Goa 403718
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Divine Dessert | Shop with ConfidenceCakesAbout UsManufacturingContactsCakesAbout UsManufacturingContactsTerms and ConditionsWelcome to Divine Dessert. By accessing and using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.1. General Conditions:By using this site, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence.We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.2. Products and Services:Our products are subject to availability and we reserve the right to limit the quantities of any products or services that we offer.We have made every effort to display as accurately as possible the colors and images of our products that appear at the store.3. Orders and Payment:By placing an order, you agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase and account information.We reserve the right to refuse or cancel your order if fraud or an unauthorized or illegal transaction is suspected.4. Pricing and Availability:Prices for our products are subject to change without notice.We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue the service (or any part or content thereof) without notice.5. Returns and Refunds:Due to the perishable nature of our products, all sales are final.
